n = int(input())
a = list(map(int, input().split()))

ans = 0

for i in range(n):
    while a[i] % 2 == 0 or a[i] % 3 == 2:
        a[i] -= 1
        ans += 1

print(ans)

N = int(input())
A = list(map(int, input().split()))

cnt = 0
for i in range(N):
    if A[i] % 2 == 0:
        cnt += 1

print(cnt)

N = int(input())
a = list(map(int, input().split()))

ans = 0

for i in range(N):
    while(a[i] % 2 == 0):
        a[i] //= 2
        ans += 1

print(ans)
